data.name: The Demon Lord is New in Town!
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1410980/Serafina_and_the_Key_to_the_Egg/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/


About the Game






Van is a powerful demon lord, but he has a problem. His power has been sealed, and he's been banished to live in the world of mortals!

Lucky for him, his devoted ally Aira is there to help him regain his strength and return to his former glory.

And who knows? Maybe he can make some new friends along the way!

Features:

  • A Resource Management Adventure Game
  • Lighthearted and Fun Story
  • Quest System
  • Leveling System
  • Friendship System
data.about_the_game:
Van is a powerful demon lord, but he has a problem. His power has been sealed, and he's been banished to live in the world of mortals!

Lucky for him, his devoted ally Aira is there to help him regain his strength and return to his former glory.

And who knows? Maybe he can make some new friends along the way!

Features:

  • A Resource Management Adventure Game
  • Lighthearted and Fun Story
  • Quest System
  • Leveling System
  • Friendship System
data.short_description: A Resource Management Adventure Game -- Play as Van, a demon lord who has had his power sealed, and has been banished to the world of mortals. Make friends and work towards regaining your former glory!
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
